00001 /* bpred-2bC.cpp: 2-bit saturating counter [Smith, ISCA 1981] */
00002 /*
00003  * __COPYRIGHT__ GT
00004  */
00005 
00006 #define COMPONENT_NAME "2bC"
00007 
00008 #ifdef BPRED_PARSE_ARGS
00009 if(!strcasecmp(COMPONENT_NAME,type))
00010 {
00011   int num_entries;
00012            
00013   if(sscanf(opt_string,"%*[^:]:%[^:]:%d",name,&num_entries) != 2)
00014     fatal("bad bpred options string %s (should be \"2bC:name:num_entries\")",opt_string);
00015   return new bpred_2bC_t(name,num_entries);
00016 }
00017 #else
00018 
00019 class bpred_2bC_t:public bpred_dir_t
00020 {
00021   class bpred_2bC_sc_t:public bpred_sc_t
00022   {
00023     public:
00024     my2bc_t * current_ctr;
00025   };
00026 
00027   protected:
00028 
00029   int num_entries;
00030   int entry_mask;
00031   my2bc_t * table;
00032 
00033   public:
00034 
00035   /* CREATE */
00036   bpred_2bC_t(char * const arg_name,
00037               const int arg_num_entries
00038              )
00039   {
00040     init();
00041 
00042     /* verify arguments are valid */
00043     CHECK_PPOW2(arg_num_entries);
00044 
00045     name = strdup(arg_name);
00046     if(!name)
00047       fatal("couldn't malloc 2bC name (strdup)");
00048     type = strdup("2bC");
00049     if(!type)
00050       fatal("couldn't malloc 2bC type (strdup)");
00051 
00052     num_entries = arg_num_entries;
00053     entry_mask = arg_num_entries-1;
00054     table = (my2bc_t*) calloc(arg_num_entries,sizeof(my2bc_t));
00055     if(!table)
00056       fatal("couldn't malloc 2bC table");
00057     for(int i=0;i<num_entries;i++)
00058       table[i] = (i&1)?MY2BC_WEAKLY_TAKEN:MY2BC_WEAKLY_NT;
00059 
00060     bits = num_entries * 2;
00061   }
00062 
00063   /* DESTROY */
00064   ~bpred_2bC_t()
00065   {
00066     if(table) free(table); table = NULL;
00067   }
00068 
00069   /* LOOKUP */
00070   BPRED_LOOKUP_HEADER
00071   {
00072     class bpred_2bC_sc_t * sc = (class bpred_2bC_sc_t*) scvp;
00073     sc->current_ctr = &table[PC&entry_mask];
00074     sc->updated = false;
00075     BPRED_STAT(lookups++;)
00076     return MY2BC_DIR(*sc->current_ctr);
00077   }
00078 
00079   /* UPDATE */
00080   BPRED_UPDATE_HEADER
00081   {
00082     class bpred_2bC_sc_t * sc = (class bpred_2bC_sc_t*) scvp;
00083     if(!sc->updated)
00084     {
00085       BPRED_STAT(num_hits += our_pred == outcome;)
00086       BPRED_STAT(updates++;)
00087       sc->updated = true;
00088     }
00089     MY2BC_UPDATE(*sc->current_ctr,outcome);
00090   }
00091 
00092   /* GET_CACHE */
00093   BPRED_GET_CACHE_HEADER
00094   {
00095     class bpred_2bC_sc_t * sc = new bpred_2bC_sc_t();
00096     if(!sc)
00097       fatal("couldn't malloc 2bC State Cache");
00098     return sc;
00099   }
00100 
00101 };
